localised_text.tooltip_text: Army View
Athel Tamarha||Improve your capability to protect Tor Yvresse by upgrading and using this secret citadel's facilities
Beastmen Panel
Blessed Spawnings||Instantly recruit unique Lizardmen units to your army. Spawnings have stats improved over those of their standard counterparts.
Blessed Spawnings||[[col:red]]No units available. Missions that grant units as rewards will be issued over time.[[/col]]
Bloodlines||Awaken powerful [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords from Bloodlines to acquire powerful factionwide benefits.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in this location.
Building Browser||View all buildings available in the selected horde.
The Ivory Road||Dispatch caravans along the Ivory Road. Each route provides its own risks and rewards.
Changing of the Ways||Hatch plots and treasons to manipulate the destiny of all beings.
Wu Xing Compass||Control the direction of the Winds of Magic to bolster your defences or enrich the lands of Cathay.
Army View
Daemonic Glory||Unlock Daemonic Gifts and units by ascribing glory to the four Chaos Gods.
[PH] Devotees
[ph] recruit from flesh lab pool
Character Details||View this character's equipment, mount and skills.
Geomantic Web||View the state of the geomantic web - links between province capitals that provide provinces with powerful commandments.
The Great Book of Grudges||Keep track of your grudges against other factions and characters.
Ice Court||Send candidates through training to become fully fledged Ice Witches and Frost Maidens.
Forbidden Workshop||Use Clan Skryre's Forbidden Workshop to upgrade war machines, weapons teams or produce a stockpile of Doomrockets.
Winds of Magic Manipulation||Push and pull the strengths of the winds across the world.
Hire Mercenaries
The Monstrous Arcanum||Track and hunt the world's most fearsome creatures to collect powerful items and place vicious monsters under your command.
[ph] recruit from flesh lab pool
Movie Viewer
Fleet View
Notification settings
Summon Units
Offices||Assign your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords to offices, giving them various bonuses.
Contracts||Accept missions offered by other factions. Completion will improve relations between you.
Raise Dead
Raise Dead from Battle Site
Shadowy Dealings||Send characters to carry out actions that advance Eshins agenda and Clan Contracts issued by the four Greater Clans.
Garrison Details||View the composition of this settlement's garrison, a local force that will defend the settlement in battle.
Overview||Manage the development of your buildings.
View in Objectives panel
Overview||Manage the development of your buildings.
Recruit Units||Recruit additional units that will defend this camp if attacked.
Slaves||Manage and view a detailed breakdown of the distribution of [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]slaves across all of your provinces.
Sacrifices to Sotek||Perform Rituals to instantly gain Regiments of Renown, Army Abilities, Banners, Followers and other benefits.
Toggle Strategic Overview||Evaluate campaign progress from a global perspective
[PH] Teleport to battle
Next notification
Previous notification

DEV UI - gets the closest AI army to attack this selection on their next turn, if possible. If fails, will output to console reasons why could not. PROTIP: Use teleporting (select army, ctrl+leftclick) to move an army next to you to make this process quicker!
Toggle radar map

tab_events.comment: Original Comment - We simulate a click on ourselves when getting events if not already seleted to auto open the list!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf(IsScriptLockActive("disable_events_dropdown_button") == false && self.IsSelected == false && EventFeedContext.EventGroupList.Filter(EventList.IsEmpty == false).IsEmpty == false, self.SimulateLClick)

localised_text.tooltip_text: Known Factions
Lords & Heroes

button_pending_negotiations.comment: This is for showing pending negotiations sent from other players in sim turns mpc. When clicked shows a popup with the pending negotiations which can then click on to access

localised_text.tooltip_text: Pending Negotiations
These are the negotations sent by other players awaiting your review
Left-click to open negotiation
These are the negotiations you have proposed that are awaiting review from other players
Left-click to open negotiation

button_diplomacy.componentleveltooltip: Diplomacy||Negotiate with other factions to form treaties or exact demands.

dev_button_end_turn_just_for_me.componentleveltooltip: DEV UI - ends turn just for player, skipping all others factions turn

end_turn_docker.comment: This propagates context constantly to avoid having to have update constant on all child components individually

hud_campaign.comment: every time the event feed is updated it will be propagated to all components that need it (tab_events, end_turn_button)

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: This character has available skill points to spend.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: CampaignRoot.IsCinematicModeEnabled == false && IsContextValid(CampaignBattleContext) == false && IsScriptLockActive("hide_3d_ui") == false

alert_icon.componentleveltooltip: You are not currently researching any technologies.
New contracts are available for selection.

radar_icon_parent_armies.comment: Shows our forces and enemy forces

radar_icon_parent_agents.comment: Shows our agents and enemy agents

radar_icon_parent_rifts.comment: Shows our agents and enemy agents

icon_new_equipment.comment: In prologue show if any item unlocked, in non-prologue only show if armory pieces unlocked as ancillaries could be a bit spammy

under_menu_bar_list_parent.comment: This is parent for player lists and telestration and objectives components so that they stack nicely

icon_tech_required.componentleveltooltip: Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.

chaos_mission_counter.componentleveltooltip: number of Chaos missions to stomp

icon_teleport_available_daemon_prince.comment: Ian wanted to highlight teleport functionality first time it was available playing as daemon prince

button_open_war_coordination.componentleveltooltip: War coordination||Coordinate military efforts with your allies or vassals.

script_failure.componentleveltooltip:
LUA has failed since last campaign load - many features are likely to be broken until the campaign is reloaded!
These warnings can be disabled by deactivating the "Enable Context Viewer" setting in the options menu.
